item.title: Using Tomcat 8.5 with Eclipse Neon on Ubuntu
item.author: mc
item.description: When you start learning Spring MVC development configuring Tomcat server in Eclipse Neon IDE can be a difficult task. This tutorial will help you setup your development environment.
